from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *

# Read json to spark dataframe
df_paavo = spark.read.option("multiline", "true").json("abfss://paavotest@group1adls.dfs.core.windows.net/paavotestdata.json")

df_paavo.printSchema()

from pyspark.sql.functions import col, explode, regexp_replace

# Explode tha data array
df_data = df_paavo.select(explode(col("data")).alias("data"))

# Key and values are arrays, extract elements (103 in total)
df_flattened = df_data.select(
    col("data.key")[0].alias("Kunta"),
    col("data.values")[0].alias("Asukkaat_yhteensa (HE)"),
    col("data.values")[1].alias("Miehet (HE)")
)

# Delete all rows starting with MK to keep only cities
df_filtered = df_flattened.filter(~col("Kunta").startswith("MK"))

# Delete "KU" from the beginning of Kunta
df_cleaned = df_filtered.withColumn("Kunta", regexp_replace(col("Kunta"), "^KU", ""))

df_cleaned.show()
